biotools.summary: The software is dedicated to Spatial Clustering with EM and Markov Models. It proposes a variety of algorithms for supervised and unsupervised classification of multidimensional and spatially-located data. The main techniques use the EM algorithm for soft clustering and Markov Random Fields (MRF) for spatial modelling.
